name: Connor's Desert Adventure
description:
Connor's Desert Adventure is a side-scroller game where you play as a mexican character and run on a path where there's huge tumbleweed that will slow you down.
With every tumbleweed you pass, you will get one score and you can compete with yourself with the built-in highscore system.

The goal of this game is to compete with yourself.

To control your character, you will have to slide by pressing S or jump by pressing SPACE.
